info.name: Shopping & Booking API
info.description:
formerly known as Zeus

* search/availability checking
* book
* cancel

View documentation: http://dev.rakutentravelxchange.com/zeus/index.html

header.description: Session ID is used to group related operations together.

request.description: Retrieves the list of hotels with rate from a selected package (lowest price), based on a list of hotel IDs.

response.name: Hotel List

header.description: Session ID is used to group related operations together.
Session ID is used to group related operations together.

request.description: Retrieves the list of hotels with rate from a selected package (lowest price), based on a list of hotel IDs.

response.name: Hotel Rooms 1

header.description: Session ID is used to group related operations together.

response.name: Hotel Rooms

header.description: Session ID is used to group related operations together.

body.raw:
{
	"search": {
        "hotel_id_list": [
            "PLPo"
        ],
        "check_in_date": "2020-05-01",
        "check_out_date": "2020-05-02",
        "room_count": 1,
        "adult_count": 2,
        "currency": "USD",
        "locale": "en-US",
        "source_market": "US",
        "children": [
            6,
            8
        ]
    },
	"package": {
        "hotel_id": "PLPo",
        "room_details": {
            "room_code": "01001520",
            "rate_plan_code": "7000",
            "description": "Standard Room Queen Beds",
            "food": 7,
            "room_type": "Standard",
            "room_view": "",
            "beds": {
                "queen": 2
            },
            "supplier_description": "Standard - 2 Queen Bed"
        },
        "booking_key": "5e20e96d",
        "room_rate": 173.49,
        "room_rate_currency": "USD",
        "client_commission": 8.67,
        "client_commission_currency": "USD",
        "chargeable_rate": 182.16,
        "chargeable_rate_currency": "USD",
        "indicative_market_rates": [
            {
                "market_rate": 171.75,
                "market_rate_currency": "USD",
                "market_rate_supplier": "snt",
                "market_rate_supplier_name": "",
                "market_rate_supplier_logo_url": "",
                "market_description": "",
                "market_supplier_description": "",
                "market_non_refundable": false,
                "food": 0
            }
        ],
        "rate_type": "net"
    }
}
